entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 09:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 64 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
